title: Sr. Engineering Program Manager - Compute, Apple Services Engineering
summary: The Apple Services Engineering team is one of the most exciting examples of Apple’s long-held passion for combining art and technology. These are the people who power the App Store, Apple TV, Apple Music, Apple Podcasts, and Apple Books.
description: We are looking for someone who is passionate about leading teams and bringing Apple’s cloud infrastructure to the next level. You are skilled at driving software product development across a globally distributed organization and delivering new products and features that meaningfully surprise and delight our internal customers...
key_qualifications: Exceptional interpersonal, project management, and technical skill; 5+ years experience in software development project management in Infrastructure domains, preferably compute; Prior Engineering, Infrastructure experience a plus; Experience running Cloud and Infrastructure projects. Past experience with deployments to AWS / Kubernetes platforms would be a plus...
preferred_qualifications: Experience running Cloud and Infrastructure projects. Past experience with containers/storage would be a plus; Agile project experience with evidence and able to demonstrate knowledge; SCRUM background and/or played the role of a Scrum Master is plus; Experience with prioritizing features and technical road maps...
